guest.name: Rachel Lockett
guest.title: Executive Coach
guest.background: Rachel Lockett is an executive coach and former HR leader at high-growth tech companies like Pinterest and Stripe. She specializes in helping founders and technical leaders develop emotional intelligence, resilience, and high-performing team cultures.
guest.background_zh: Rachel Lockett 是一位资深高管教练，曾在 Pinterest 和 Stripe 担任人力资源高管。她专注于帮助创始人及技术领导者提升情商、增强韧性，并打造高绩效的团队文化。

episodeSummary: Rachel Lockett discusses the critical shift leaders must make from "having all the answers" to coaching their teams. She shares actionable frameworks for active listening, preventing burnout through energy audits, managing co-founder conflict, and using Nonviolent Communication (NVC) to navigate difficult conversations in high-growth environments.
episodeSummary_zh: Rachel Lockett 探讨了领导者如何从“全知全能”的执行者转型为赋能团队的教练。她分享了多个极具实操性的框架，包括用于深度沟通的主动倾听技巧、预防职业倦怠的能量审计法、管理联合创始人冲突的策略，以及在高增长环境下利用非暴力沟通（NVC）处理艰难对话的方法。
